content: this shawl may be light as a feather but no matter what you ve heard about crochet it is certainly *not* stiff as a board alternating double_crochet row and mesh row this shawl will let you show off your yarn and make it look its best a simple two-row repeat this pattern is easy to learn and hard to forget you can come and go to your project without having to remember where you left off great for when you want a project for staying indoors on a cold weekend video tutorial for this shawl has been made available by fiberspider and can be found right here 1 thanks so much to fiberspider for his video **items made from my patterns are intended for personal use sale or world domination--as long as i get a parking space wherever i want once the world is yours ** 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=rwkxsoctxuy
